snippet.title: Galaxy Fight Club - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Galaxy Fight Club is a fast-paced 3v3 multiplayer and battle royale game made to play with friends. You can choose from a number of our heroes and equip them with the best weapons to take part in our tournaments.
Unlock and level up your heroes, win key fragments from battles to open loot boxes to obtain weapons and armour to get stronger.

MULTIPLE GAME MODES
- Death Match (3v3): team up with your friends or other people across the world, the first team to get 20 eliminations win the game
- Showdown (1v1): settle the debate once and for all with your friends, the person who get to 10 eliminations first win the match
- Coin Capture (3v3): team up and out-strategize the opposing team, collect and hold enough coins to win

A UNIVERSE OF HEROES
Play with characters across different collections include Galaxy Fight Club, Animetas, Illuvium, Cryptoadz, as well as weapons from Metakey and other projects

WEAPONS AND ARMOUR
Win key fragments to create keys for opening loot boxes, unlock rare weapons and armour which can be forged together to create mysterious legendary weapons

NEW CONTENT
Keep an eye out for new characters from new collections, skins, battle arenas, and other game modes in the future

Features
- Free to play with free heroes and weapons
- Team up for real-time 3v3 MOBA fighters with friends or other players
- Win key fragments to forge keys and open loot boxes
- Unlock weapons and armour to forge into new, more powerful mysterious weapons and trade them on the marketplace
- Climb rankings to the top of the leaderboard and level up your character
- Leasing system to lend out your fighters and weapons for others to play
- Tournament with generous rewards

Playing with characters from the same collection gives a significant combat boost, tell your friends and team up for battle!
